Hello everyone,

Crawl-by-Example plugin for Heritrix, done as a part of Go=
ogle Summer 
of Code project under the guidance of Gordon Mohr, is now rele=
ased for 
download.

Crawl-By-Example classifies the processed pages by sub=
jects and finds 
the best pages according to examples provided by the opera=
tor. 
Thus, the process of discovering pages of interest is automated and 
=
the user is freed from the grueling task of, so to speak, looking for 
a ne=
edle in a haystack.

For more details about the project and download see: 
=
http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/SOC06/Crawl-By-Example

Micha=
el Bendersky
